item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: June 1, 2024 Today's Verse Psalm 25:7 [7] Remember not the sins of my youth or my transgressions; according to your steadfast love remember me, for the sake of your goodness, O LORD! Today's Memory Verse James 1:22 - But be doers of the word, and not hearers only, deceiving yourselves. John 14:6 - Jesus said to him, â€œI am the way, and the truth, and the life. No one comes to the Father except through me.
